inclusion.criterion: At least one documented spontaneous VVS during preceding 12 months or one syncope in history leading to injury and minimum 2 presyncopal events during preceding 12 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Refractory to all recommended types of standard treatment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Significantly decreased quality of life due to syncope
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Other possible and treatable causes of syncope such as significant cardiac disease, cardiac arrhythmia or abnormalities of vertebro-basiliar arteries
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has history of CAD and prior MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. He was recently discharged after a negative work-up for syncope which included the implantation of a cardiac monitoring device.
